verses.name: Matthew 4:1
verses.text: Then was Jesus led up of the Spirit into the wilderness to be tempted of the devil.

verses.name: Matthew 4:2
verses.text: And when he had fasted forty days and forty nights, he was afterward an hungred.

verses.name: Matthew 4:3
verses.text: And when the tempter came to him, he said, If thou be the Son of God, command that these stones be made bread.

verses.name: Matthew 4:4
verses.text: But he answered and said, It is written, Man shall not live by bread alone, but by every word that proceedeth out of the mouth of God.
